properties.name: label
properties.description: Label at the top of the textarea

properties.name: validators
properties.description: Array of validator Objects. When multiple validators fail, only one error is displayed, determined by their order in the array. Each Object should have three fields:

subProperty.name: message
subProperty.description: Error message that shown when validation fails

subProperty.name: validator
subProperty.description: Function that takes input value as an argument and returns Boolean

properties.name: maxCharacters
properties.description: Maximum number of charactors you can input without errors

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Is disable textarea when set as true

properties.name: showValidations
properties.description: Responsible for displaying validation of textarea

properties.name: showMaxCharacters
properties.description: Responsible for displaying max characters info

properties.name: alt
properties.description: When the props passed the alternative styles will be applied

events.name: validation
events.description: Emitted when the textarea value changes or in initial proccess depend on initValidation value

events.name: input
events.description: Emitted for updating the value props
